name: GRIME (itch) (desaraealesley, nabilatsoulcade, audiodave, mlightat, whitegold61, Jeremy Dandeneau)
name_original: GRIME (itch) (desaraealesley, nabilatsoulcade, audiodave, mlightat, whitegold61, Jeremy Dandeneau)
description:
GRIME is an online open world survival game that players can enjoy with friends. Collect resources to build weapons and craft recipes. Alien slimes drop valuable loot that can be used for recipes. Build stronger weapons to farm more resources. Rise and GRIME and survive with friends.

CONTROLS:

W, A, S, D - Movement Controls

Arrow Keys Left/Right (→, ←) - Camera Movement

Left Click - Attack

Tab - Inventory

Tab Right Click - Drop Inventory

Tab Left Click - Use Item

E - Pick up Inventory

Q -  Dance Emote
